title: Retry deployment or generate preview draft with downloadable files

requirements.text: Retry deployment with current build configuration and attempt to deploy the AFO Ride Driver application live
acceptanceCriteria: Deployment is attempted with existing build artifacts
If deployment succeeds, application is accessible at live URL
Deployment status is clearly communicated to user

requirements.text: If deployment fails, generate a preview draft of the application without attempting live deployment, ensuring all features are functional in preview mode

quotes: If deployment fails again, generate preview draft only.
Do not deploy live, just create working preview and downloadable app files.

acceptanceCriteria: Preview draft is generated only if deployment fails
Preview draft includes all implemented features functioning correctly
No live deployment is attempted after failure
Preview is accessible for testing and demonstration

requirements.text: Generate downloadable application files including all source code, assets, and build artifacts that can be deployed independently

quotes: just create working preview and downloadable app files

acceptanceCriteria: Downloadable package includes complete frontend source code
Downloadable package includes complete backend source code
All generated assets and images are included in download
Package includes build configuration and deployment instructions
Downloaded files can be built and deployed independently

constraints: Do not attempt live deployment after initial retry fails
Preserve all existing features and functionality in preview mode
Ensure preview draft is fully functional for demonstration purposes
nonGoals: Making code changes or feature modifications
Creating alternative deployment strategies beyond preview draft
